title: @Riot Team Lore - Weekly Reminder About Karma Lore
body: We still don't have her updated lore that you promised us. You said it was practically done so where is it? Is this another instance where content and work on this champion is going to take 6 years to release? Karma mains are feeling ignored still.

replies.body:
Thanks for your patience. :-) It's done, I just have to get the thumbs-up for when it will be released.

(And to think people blame us Narrative folks for content not going out!)
Thanks for the reply. Looking forward to reading it :)
